product_name: Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim Jeans - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: With traditional blue-jean style and fit, plus performance features like stretch and a durable water repellent coating, the Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim Jeans keep you moving along in comfort. Jeans are made with a stretchy blend of cotton, polyester and spandex, and have a comtemporary fit that sits below the waist and has straight legs. Fabric is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. Standard 5-pocket design. The Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim jeans have a standard fit.
short_description: With traditional blue-jean style and fit, plus performance features like stretch and a durable water repellent coating, the Mountain Hardwear Stretchstone Denim Jeans keep you moving along in comfort.
